title: Reaction Setup
content: Use 2.0g salicylic acid, 3mL acetic anhydride, and 5 drops of concentrated H2SO4 as catalyst. Heat in water bath at 85Â°C for 15 minutes.

title: Safety Notes
content: Acetic anhydride is corrosive and reacts violently with water. Use fume hood. Wear gloves and goggles. Have ice bath ready for quenching.
